timeline.bodyText: this isn't in the spec, and i don't think we need to map it, as the way i read https://httpstatuses.com/499 is that nginx just uses this internally (b/c how can it return 499 to the client if the client closes the connection 😄)

timeline.bodyText: Why don't we set Ok status?
timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: Thought it's not helpful and would just cause extra data to be sent, but indeed this probably isn't the correct layer to worry about it (exporters could strip out OK status if they want)
